entries.name: api_key()
entries.desc: The API key from the command options or from the user's configuration.

entries.name: host()
entries.desc: The host to connect to either from the RUBYGEMS_HOST environment variable or from the user's configuration

entries.name: rubygems_api_request(method, path, host = nil, allowed_push_host = nil, &block)
entries.desc: Creates an RubyGems API to host and path with the given HTTP method.

entries.name: set_api_key(host, key)
entries.desc: Returns true when the user has enabled multifactor authentication from response text and no otp provided by options.

entries.name: sign_in(sign_in_host = nil)
entries.desc: Signs in with the RubyGems API at sign_in_host and sets the rubygems API key.

entries.name: verify_api_key(key)
entries.desc: Retrieves the pre-configured API key key or terminates interaction with an error.

entries.name: with_response(response, error_prefix = nil)
entries.desc: If response is an HTTP Success (2XX) response, yields the response if a block was given or shows the response body to the user.
